Portal 2 is an excellent game. I would recommend it to any gamer who likes puzzles, science, robots, humor, or very sterile environments! This game is all of that wrapped up into one hybrid package of a video game. This game has been one of my favorite games ever since I first played the first. To anyone considering buying this game, I dare say you should buy it. Heck! Buy a copy for a friend so you can both laugh together at sarcasm from an omnipotent AI!

This game is a little bit different from the first one. I couldn't tell you if it's better or worse, but it's just a bit different. While the first game was mostly small rooms and thinking puzzles, This game is large rooms with less thinking and more story. There ARE still times that the game is like the first, but most of the second half of the game is spent looking for the Portal-compatible surface that you missed in order to advance the story. The coop mode is a great game to play with a friend(or little brother). If you only have one copy of the game, you can use two controllers (or remap the first controller as the second, while player 1 uses the KB & M) to play splitscreen mode, which is unfortunately a rare find in modern day multiplayer games, especially on PC. If you don't have a friend who has or wants to buy the game, that's okay, it's still a good purchase. If you don't have the first game, be sure to buy it in a bundle with this game!
A very fun, and difficult, puzzle game!
It's way more better(and harder) than the first Portal game, and the story is still awesome. One of my favorites, and you can play Co-op.
Great Puzzles and great storyline. What more could you ask for! The characters are voiced really well and the game looks really good. Get it today.

Questo gioco è un capolavoro assoluto. Come già molti utenti hanno scritto nelle loro recensioni, posso concordare affermando che ha superato anche le mie di aspettative. Non solo conferma ciò che si è visto di buono nel già ottimo Portal, ma riesce anche a migliorarsi. Tra i vari puzzle ed una sana dose di humor nero che vi terrà compagnia per le circa 10 ore di gioco (single player, senza contare anche la divertentissima co-op), non potrete non innamorarvene! D'obbligo per chi ha adorato il primo Portal. Per chi non ha ancora giocato nessuno dei due, consiglio vivamente di procurarsi entrambi i giochi e di iniziare a testare... se non per voi, fatelo almeno per la scienza! ;D

Portal was sort of a little experiment of a huge company. That’s why success of the first part of the Portal was a surprise even for the VALVe. Therefore seriously question arose about the Portal 2. And what we got? Let's see.

　STILL ALIVE?

　　The game begins with the fact that Chell along with her new partner, personality module Wheatley, is trying to escape from an abandoned Aperture Science laboratory. Throughout the game, the plot makes a interesting twists. Individual deserves compliments perfect finale, after which there remain only a warm feeling. In Portal 2 no epic stories, huge explosions, incredible action, or the salvation of humanity. Instead, there is a charismatic characters, intelligent humor and interesting puzzles.

　ONE IS GOOD, BUT TWO IS BETTER

　　One of the achievements of the new Portal has been the emergence of the cooperative. Co-op story is a continuation of the plot of the single player. At first I thought that the only difference of the cooperative is the presence of two players with portal-guns, instead of one. In fact, the cooperative has unique ideas. Many puzzles solving quite differently. I advise you not to play cooperative with a random person (there is that possibility), and play it with a good friend.

　ENDLESS TESTS

　　In game was added a level editor, so anyone can create their own test chambers or try to play the levels of other players. To be honest, most of the player-created levels are too simple or ridiculous. But there is sufficient interesting maps (and some of them really hard). In no case do not miss the community maps.

　Multiplayer:
　　Online: Θ Θ Θ Θ Θ Θ Θ Θ Θ Θ 
　　Co-op:    ☺☺☺☺☺☺☺☺☺O
　Storyline:   ☺☺☺☺☺☺☺☺☺O
　Graphics:   ☺☺☺☺☺☺☺☺☺O
　Gameplay: ☺☺☺☺☺☺☺☺☺☺

　

　Complexity of the achievements: All achievements can be easily earned (if you have good friend for the co-op) in the one-two walkthrough.

　　　　[i]VALVe made another good
　　game. With good intelligent humor,
　　charismatic characters and unusual
　　interesting gameplay.

　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　As expected, nine out of ten [9/10].

No portal e portal 2 é concedida uma arma que tem a capacidade de criar buracos de minhoca que se interligam de forma a se atravessar de um para o outro. Recomendo este jogo especialmente a aqueles que gostam de puzzle.

Dieses Spiel wird ja generell hoch gelobt und das auch zurecht. Ich feier die Source Engine generell total, da sie auch auf schlechteren Rechnern ruckelfrei läuft und trotzdem super aussieht. Portal 2 an sich macht einen Total süchtig und es ist sehr abwechslungsreich. Die Story vom Singleplayer ist super durchdacht und auch perfekt umgesetzt. Beim Co-Op ist zwar weniger Story mit drin, dafür macht es aber mega Spass seinen Kumpel mal zu trollen ;) Super Spiel nicht nur für Leute die gern Rätseln sondern auch für andere

EDIT FROM THE FUTURE:  Most of this is me being a nerdy scallop.  None of this is needed, but I still reccomend it nonetheless.

Gosh... This game.  It'z amazing!  How have I not written a review for it yet?  Everything about it is fun.  I mean, you have a [i]MASSIVE[/i] Singleplayer Campaign with a well thought out Story.  And you also have a Co-Op Campaign, with brilliant chamber design.  And even if you're done with the game, you can keep coming back for more with community made test chambers!  It's just so much bigger and better than the original Portal.  Speaking of how I feel about the original Portal... What did I rate it?  9.8 out of 10?  Well then, I say Portal 2 is a 23.6 out of 10!
Bellissimo gioco,ve lo consiglio se siete amanti dei puzzle game(rompicapo).

Possibly the only game I've played that makes you feel smarter as you play it. Like a massive sudoku, only fun. Also brilliant voice acting, characters and level design. I've heard the co-op isn't bad too.

One of my very favorite games. Portal was an awesome game, now you make it even better with a deeper story, better graphics and more testing elements. My favorite, besides a portal? Lasers or light bridges, can't pick. There is so much more to this game than beating it. You find all the hidden areas, make your own test chambers, get all the achievements and other things. Just like Portal. But the one thing that makes me really mad is when people dont even play portal 1 and say they hate portal 2. Don't believe them; they only say that because they dont know the story. You should make a thing where you cant buy a sequel for a game unless you bought the original and beat it.
